name: sa-abvi

stmt.origin: eqtri(universe, cab(s0, w0), cab(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s0))))

|- wceq(universe, cab(s0, w0))

comment: A theorem about the universal class. Inference associated with ~ bj-abv (which is proved from fewer axioms). (Contributed by Stefan Allan, 9-Dec-2008.)
